alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:44PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Monroe County through 215 PM CDT... At 144 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Amory, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hatley, Gattman, Sipsey Fork, Quincy, Greenwood Springs, Splunge, Wise Gap, Athens and Parham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
